page.title: 10PUBS AND ENTERTAINMENT.
page.content:
The main idea of a public house is to sell drinks to the public, but we found that most pubs offer a lot more than drinks. Not only do people go to pubs for a drink, but also for social meetings. In a survey of six pubs, we discovered that most of the pubs had darts and pool tables and very often darts and pool teams. In a survey of these six pubs all of them had at least three of the following entertainments:-
jukebox garden pool/snooker table darts board fruit machines darts team live music other teams
Live music appeared to be unpopular, but juke boxes were very common.
